website_summaries.verdict: An exceptional pan from a top manufacturer. You pay a premium for it, but it’s a cast iron crepe pan that can be used to prepare other foods as well.

customer_reviews.title: What a way to make crepes
customer_reviews.text: The cast iron crepe pan works great. I went to a cooking class and saw how many options crepes can be used for from snacks, desserts etc. After much research, I settled on the Le Creuset Cast-iron 10-2/3-inch Crepe Pan, Cherry Red which matched our kitchen. It is a little heavier so I would suggest doublechecking the weight and finding a comparable item to ensure you wouldn't have a problem lifting and using during crepe cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie S

customer_reviews.title: Takes some practice but okay for novices as well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. It takes a little practice to get the batter perfect and get the technique down but we made decent crepes on the first try and pretty good ones by the 2nd or 3rd time. Use plenty of butter and you won't have any issues with sticking.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict85

customer_reviews.title: great crepe pan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use in our RV as we didn't have electricity. It worked get on the propane stove. The weight of the pan makes for even heat distribution. It should work great on a glass top or induction stove as well. It cleans up by just rubbing the excess oil off with a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: pan gets 5 stars, tools get less
customer_reviews.text: Pan is amazing and I think this purchase is worth it for that alone. The spatula that came with it was not smooth, the pointy edge was kinda blunted and the wood was splintering a bit. I bought a new one at the store for <$10 to avoid getting splinters in my crepes. Other than that I am 100% satisfied with the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: If you want the best cookware you have to spend a few dollars. This is another case in point. Excellent and even heating, makes cooking crepes so easy...but the pan ain't cheap. Still, I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Everything I've tried to make with this sticks somewhere, no matter how much butter is used. Skip this complete mess and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Kolesnikov

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised, check package immediately
customer_reviews.text: Package was tampered and accessories not in box. Bit of a lack luster gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, high quality, heavy cast iron crepe maker is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the pan. Easy to use, clean and cook crepes evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with the spatula and rateau
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the rateau and spatula as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey R Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Better Crepes than a Teflon Pan Can Give
customer_reviews.text: Don't tell Alton Brown, but I ignored his advice, and got myself a crepe pan. Never mind that it has only one practical use in the kitchen...it improved the quality of my crepes considerably over the teflon pan. I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cocette

customer_reviews.title: Turns out quality crèpes...
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset quality, expensive but if you like to get down on a stack of crèpes, why not do it right.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Crepes turn out nicely after some practice.
customer_reviews.author: S Bond

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but heavy (cast iron) pan is perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb crepe pan - crepes and pancakes are cooked evenly and do not get stuck. Easy to use but heavy (cast iron) pan is perfect for my induction stove top. Very easy to clean Also looks great as a serving plate, and keeps the crepes warm for at least 10-15 minutes. Would make a nice gift for anyone who has kids and loves to cook, since it is not a cheap "must have"item.
customer_reviews.author: G Pi

customer_reviews.title: OK, handle gets really hot
customer_reviews.text: After it had enough butter baked in, the crepes came out fine. My 3 stars relates to the handle - it gets hot really fast, and gets really hot.
customer_reviews.author: nycspagirl

customer_reviews.title: Best investment in the kitchen supplies
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is now saying that my crepes are the best. Kids would do anything for crepe breakfast. My secret is to supplement crepe with Nutella, banana and strawberry, and fold it right on the pan. So delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy Selivanov

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Crepe Pan
customer_reviews.text: You can be confident that this crepe high quality pan will become an a stylish heirloom addition to your kitchen cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for making crepe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for making crepe; but it sticks to the pan, even after using butter or oil on the pan. Of course it is very slick looking. A good ornament for my kitchen. But don't get deceived by the looks; it is not functional (for what it says - Crepe Pan). I am lazy to return it, so I am using it to toast my bread; make grilled cheese sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Soudamini M. Nath

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed, maybe I didn't use the good top cook ?
customer_reviews.author: Dajaab

customer_reviews.title: "Le Creuset" The Name Says It All!  Superb
customer_reviews.text: This heavy-duty enameled, cast iron crepe pan will last a lifetime and then some with proper care. It is absolutely beautiful and very well made. You really do get what you pay for. The heat retention of the heavy pan is perfect for holding the perfect temperature. Once you get that temp dialed in you can make crepe after crepe beautifully. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GRP Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent crepe pan!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent crepe pan! I looked for a long time before taking the $ plunge to buy this crepe pan. Heats quickly & stays hot & allowed me to make excellent crepes. Let the pan cool completely before washing, as instructed, clean up was easy. The pan is heavy but that's fine with me because i just leave it on the one burner I am using & if I wanted to move it to another place on our cook top I could just slide it over.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Richardson

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, and the highest quality. Instructions say to use medium heat, but bump it up a notch to get proper golden brown color/crispy edges. Batter should be the consistency of cold heavy cream to achieve the correct thickness. Clean in the sink with light soap to retain seasoning. Crepe quality improves with usage. A+
customer_reviews.author: GoyVey

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love all my Le Creuset pieces. This one sat in my amazon cart for a very long time and I finally decided to get it. Very glad I did. Using it as per directions, ONLY FOR CREPES! I have other non stick pans also Le Creuset and perhaps I didn't follow the directions properly because they have peeled a bit. So far this one has held up, but again only using for crepes. They turn out perfectly. So far, great product. Also love the heft of a cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Add-on bday gift was a success
customer_reviews.text: It came with the recipe and on the first try we got the homemade crepes we’ve always wanted. It’s super heavy. Distributed the heat evenly and takes a few minutes to warm up. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Asilda

customer_reviews.title: Le Creuset is all you need to know
customer_reviews.text: Magnificent. We primarily use it for quesadillas and pancakes. Great heat distribution, smooth surface. Low lip makes it easy to flip.
customer_reviews.author: R Silvert

customer_reviews.title: Good pan, takes a little bit of practice to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good pan, takes a little bit of practice to use it, because its heavy and you have to use included tool to spread batter out. Watch coupe of YouTube videos, not that complicated
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING crepes can be made easily
customer_reviews.text: This pan works FABULOUSLY when you follow the directions. You definitely have to heat it for the full 5 minutes. After that, AMAZING crepes can be made easily! :) Weekend brunch is now at a new level of AWESOME! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great crepes
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Wife loves it and I love it more. Takes a bit of practice to get the crepes right but they are delicious and turn out great with this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Jakartaguy

customer_reviews.title: Though after it's been well heated it's extremely easy to make crepes
customer_reviews.text: I have a feeling that the pan doesn't warm up very well close to the handle. Though after it's been well heated it's extremely easy to make crepes.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! It took me a couple times to get the hang of it and get the right temperature setting but now my crepes are coming out like a pro!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Crepe pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Le Creuset enameled Cast-Iron Crepe pan! It works beautifully to make the thinnest, most delicious delicate crepes I've ever had. I am so happy I bought it! I also use it to make Indian Dosas!
customer_reviews.author: MarianLibrarian

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: made the best crepes of my life - very simple to use and care is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: ynkhlwto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect crepes in this pan....
customer_reviews.text: Good even heat... works great on glass top stove with medium heat... should last a lifetime with proper care...easy to flip crepe over..
customer_reviews.author: Glenn9

customer_reviews.title: aspirational device
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, good quality. It is a perfect aspirational device. It along with my french Olive-Wood turner have sat unused, only because I lost interest in making Crepes before they arrived. Considering I have two day shipping, my attention span is short. Maybe if I go back to France, I will fall in love with the idea of making Crepes again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pirtle

customer_reviews.title: Too small to make a real size crepe; we ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small to make a real size crepe; we were not looking for a large pancake size. Returned it for another option
customer_reviews.author: IzzyD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a birthday present and she has been making amazing crepes. Per her, the quality of this pan is excellent. The cooking surface is so smooth that no oil or butter is required. This pan will also be excellent for pancakes. The enamel surface is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: ATW

customer_reviews.title: It is not easy to use this pan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to making crepes with this pan. Sadly, I have not been successful. I blame it on electric stove. It took me almost a year to figure out correct temperature needed for crepes not to stick. I hope from now on to be able to make good crepes. It is too heavy for people with arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Dorixona

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly multi-use
customer_reviews.text: This pan is excellent for pancakes, crepes, etc. (I don't find it all that great for eggs). No problems with sticking, but I do treat it much as I do my reg. cast iron (apply a light coating of oil after each use). It also sees a lot of oven time in making homemade pizza--the crust bakes perfectly! Due to its lighter weight, convenient size, and easier clean-up, this is one of the more frequently used pieces of cast iron I own.
customer_reviews.author: Monocles

customer_reviews.title: Big crepes!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by America's Test Kitchen, and it's great, although you need to know that it makes very big crepes, and the pan is heavy. It comes with a batter spreader and a wooden spatula to loosen the edge of the crepe. With some practice, the spreader is quite handy. I think that if you are a real whiz, you can manage smaller crepes after a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Batres
